colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @130A *, ,(CES KLONG GSAL RDO RJE SNYING PO LAS, ,RIG 'DUS BLA MA'I DKYIL 'KHOR DU BSKYED RDZOGS RDZOGS PA CHEN PO'I KHRID @130B YIG ZAB DON RIN CHEN GSER 'PHRENG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI GRUB THOB DZA YA SE NA DANG, KHYE'U CHUNG RDO RJE GRAGS SOGS ZAB LAM RDZOGS PA CHEN PO LA BRTEN NAS GROL BA BRNYES PA DAM PA DU MA'I RNAM SPRUL DUS GSUM RGYAL BA RGYAL BA KUN GYI NGO BO RDO RJE 'CHANG SDE SPRUL RIN PO CHE RDZOGS CHEN 'KHRID YIG 'GA' ZHIG RGYAS CHE DRAG PA DANG, ,'GA' ZHIG BSDUS CHE DRAG PA'I, ,'DIR TSIG NYUNG DON GSAL ZHIG THUGS BZHED KYI BKA'I GNANG BA RTZAL BA'I RKYEN GYIS RANG YANG GZHI LAM 'BRAS GSUM TSANG BA ZHIG BYED PA'I 'DUN PA LHAG PAR CHE BA'I STENG, ,NANG SO BSOD NAMS CHOS LDAN GYIS MTSAMS SBYAR BAS KYANG, ,^ LUNG RTOGS KYI YON TAN DU MA LA MNGA' MNYES PA RDZOGS CHEN PO RDO RJE 'CHANG NGOS 'GYUR MED KUN BZANG NGES DON DBANG PO, ,'GYUR MED TSE DBANG MCHOG GRUB, ,SIDDHI CHOS KYI SENG @131A *, ,GE SOGS RDZOGS CHEN PO BLA MA DAM PA DU MA'I SPYAN SNGAR GTER KHA DU MA'I RDZOGS PA CHEN PO'I DBANG LUNG 'KHRID MAN NGAG MYONG THOG TU GTAN LA PHAB PA'I BKA' DRIN BRTEN NAS, ,CHOS TSUL 'DI LA BLO MIG YANGS PA KU SU LU'I RNAL 'BYOR PA CHE MCHOG 'DUS PA RTZAL GYIS, ,GTER STON RANG NYID KYI MDZAD PA'I RDO RJE SNYING PO LAS RDZOGS PA CHEN PO'I ZAB 'KHRID SANGS RGYAS MNYAM SBYOR DANG, ,RANG GZHUNG GI RDO RJE SNYING PO'I 'KHRID YIG ZAB LAM GDAMS PA'I SNYING PO DANG, ,RDZOGS CHEN 'KHRID YIG RIGS 'DZIN ZHAL LUNG RNAMS GTZO BOR BZUNG, GZHAN YANG, ,RDZOGS CHEN 'KHRID YIG ZAB DON KUN BZANG THUGS KYI SNYING BYANG SOGS NAS KHA 'GONG DGOS PA SNANG, ,DPAL LDAN BLA MA RNAMS KYI GSUNGS SGROS KHYAD PAR CAN LAS BYUNG BA LEGS PAR BRGYAN TE DPYAD PAS DAG PAR @132A *, ,GYUR CIG , ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm,, ,,)
